section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: BigchainDB allows developers and enterprise to deploy blockchain proof-of-concepts, platforms and applications with a scalable blockchain database. Rather than trying to scale up blockchain technology, BigchainDB starts with a distributed database and then adds blockchain characteristics - decentralized control, immutability and the ability to create and transfer assets.
